formatted_address: B-GF-31, Pusat Perdagangan Ion Akses, Persiaran Medini Sentral 6, Bandar Medini Iskandar, 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Borak Kafe

reviews.text: One of the hidden gems in jb, a lovely home based cafe with very pleasant and aromatic coffee hidden right behind Lotus shopping center. Great for working or studying away from home. Power sockets are readily available as well

Went to get my car fixed up and chanced upon a hidden jem amongst the car workshops here. Almost missed it though but so glad i found it üòÑüëçüèª. Great atmosphere & awesome service. Good coffee,  Great service & Cosy ambiance...Keep it up üëçüèª

The cafe, situated in an unusual spot surrounded by car workshops, disappoints with a limited menu and several items out of stock. The drinks, especially the RM10 Thai tea lacking its expected flavor, come with a hefty price tag. On a positive note, the fresh tauhu bakar is good, but the peanut sauce is lacking and not abundant.

Good food, fast service, clean store. Parking is a bit difficult because the shop is a workshop area. I just pass by while send my car to service.. found a peaceful place for my lunch.. felt as 5üåü cafe with cleanliness‚Ä¶  taste of food 4/5

This is my first time come here, the reason is I searching for chicken butter milk then saw on foodpanda so I direct come here. At first I was curious this places got cafe meh then really got leh and the chicken butter milk is the bestttt I really like it and probably will come again and again. Plus point is the cafe feel like home really relaxing guys

vicinity: B-GF-31, Pusat Perdagangan Ion Akses, Persiaran Medini Sentral 6, Bandar Medini Iskandar, Iskandar Puteri
